enhanced_by.reason: The 'algorithm' method fetches the algorithm list, which might be required to validate the 'algo' parameter in 'detailMinerList'.
The 'coinName' method fetches the coin list, which might be related to the mining context and could be used to set up the environment before calling 'detailMinerList'.
The 'minerList' method fetches a list of miners, which can be used to construct assertions for the 'detailMinerList' method as both methods deal with miner-related data.
The 'earningList' method fetches earnings data, which can be used to verify the financial aspects related to miners, enhancing the assertions for 'detailMinerList'.
